title: Western Movie | The Proud Rebel (1958) Alan Ladd, Olivia de Havilland, Dean Jagger

sources.title: Western Movie | The Proud Rebel (1958) Alan Ladd, Olivia de Havilland, Dean Jagger
sources.description:
A Confederate veteran living in the Yankee North struggles with his son's shock induced muteness and the hate of the Northerners.

Original title: The Proud Rebel (1958) 

Director: Michael Curtiz
Writers: Joseph Petracca, Lillie Hayward
Stars: Alan Ladd, Olivia de Havilland, Dean Jagger
Genres: Classic Western

00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
04:27 Father seeks cure for son's mutism, visits Dr. Davis in Illinois, who suggests specialist in Minnesota.
11:32: Conflict arises over stolen dog in a Western town, leading to accusations and a courtroom showdown.
17:44 A woman defends a man in court, offers to pay his fine, and faces societal pressure to marry in a Western movie.
22:13 A man helps a woman with her farm, facing challenges and building a bond in a Western setting.
37:25 Chandler refuses to sell his champion sheepdog despite tempting offers, while bonding with a sensitive boy named David.
46:12: A doctor brings good news to Chandler about a possible cure for a child's paralysis.
50:14: A father struggles to make a tough decision regarding his son's future and his beloved dog.
55:57 Interaction and events unfold in a rural setting involving repairs, saving lives, and social interactions.
1:18:38 Chandler struggles with selling a dog named Lance and its consequences.
1:32:01 Conflict arises over a stolen sheepdog, leading to a tense confrontation with a father and his sons in a Western setting.
